short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a checkbox that allows you to toggle shorts on or off in your YouTube subscriptions box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Adds a simple checkbox at the top of the subscriptions page
- Allows you to show or hide shorts
- Saves your preference
